group_1.textRight: Mmm... It's a beautiful morning...

group_1.textLeft: ...A walk is nice, but where are we going?

group_1.textRight: I haven't decided.

group_1.textLeft: What? You're just walking around aimlessly?

group_1.textRight: Yup.

group_1.textLeft: For no purpose whatsoever?

group_1.textRight: Yup.
Well, if I had to say, I'd say we'll be back before@Ayame wakes up... I guess?

group_1.textLeft: Are you serious...?@What's the point in that?

group_1.textRight: Relaxation doesn't need a point.@Don't think about it too hard, just enjoy it!
Come on, let's go!

group_1.textLeft: ...So this road leads here.

group_1.textRight: You didn't know that, did you?

group_1.textLeft: No...
Hm? That place...is it a toy store?

group_1.textRight: Sure looks like one...@I didn't know that, either.

group_1.textLeft: Would Ayame be happy if I told her?

group_1.textRight: Well, I'm sure she'd be happy...

group_1.textLeft: Oh...
(I couldn't help but think about Ayame...)

group_1.textRight: Hey, do you wanna buy some juice from that@vending machine and take a break?

group_1.textLeft: That would be nice.
(It might clear my mind...)
(Ayame would love this, but it might be a little@too sweet for me.)
(Wait, I'm thinking about Ayame again...)

group_1.textRight: Whoa, sour!

group_1.textLeft: ...Would you like to trade?

group_1.textRight: You sure? Thanks!

group_1.textLeft: It's really sour...!

group_1.textRight: This one's super sweet...!

group_1.textLeft: You bought it knowing it would be sour,@didn't you?

group_1.textRight: They say sour stuff is good for you when@you're tired.
It was a little too harsh, though...
And you bought this knowing it would be sweet,@didn't you?

group_1.textLeft: They say sweet things are good for you when@you're tired.

group_1.textRight: Ahaha, we had the same idea.

group_1.textLeft: ...Hm? What are those?

group_1.textRight: I don't know...acorns, and...@I think some kind of nuts?

group_1.textLeft: It's not that time of year, is it?@Did some children leave them here?

group_1.textRight: Well, they're lined up so neatly, so maybe.@Interesting find.

group_1.textLeft: ...*Giggle* Indeed, it can be fun to find@something unexpected.
I can see why Ayame picks things upâ€”
...No, nevermind...
(I've done it again...)

group_1.textRight: Thanks for the treat!@There!
Nice shot!

group_1.textLeft: Hey... It's not good manners to toss trash into@the trash can like that.

group_1.textRight: But it went in well, didn't it?
You ought to try it after you finish your drink.@It's pretty hard.

group_1.textLeft: (I missed...)

group_1.textRight: That was close.@If it misses, just pick it up and throw it away.

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:0.8][chara:302601:cheek_0][chara:302601:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:302601:lipSynch_1]*Giggle*
(Somehow, I feel like a normal high school girl@right now.)
(I've been trying so hard to survive that I haven't@had time for this.)
(People walking, sunbathing, exercising,@reading...)
(The daily lives of people who enjoy their@hobbies, things I never paid attention to...)
...Hazuki, thank you for bringing me out.
At first, I was reluctant to walk around@for no reason...
But now it feels refreshing...

group_1.textRight: I'm glad to hear that.

group_1.textLeft: (After all, I've always been confined to a small@world.)
(I was so comfortable there that I didn't want@to make contact with the outside world.)
(Maybe I should try to get more exposure to@things beyond that bubble...)

group_1.textRight: It's our day off tomorrow.@Why don't we go for a hike?

group_1.textLeft: A hike...?

group_1.textRight: Weren't you interested in those nuts earlier?
You can see a lot of plants in the mountains.

group_1.textLeft: ...I'm not particularly interested in plants,@though.

group_1.textRight: Now, now.@It's important to start somewhere.
